title: Critérium du Dauphiné stage 2: Julian Alaphilippe back in high life again
content:
Two-time world champion kicks to confidence-boosting win while Jumbo-Visma's Steven Kruijswijk crashes out and the Dutchman will miss next month's Tour de France.

Read the full article at Critérium du Dauphiné stage 2: Julian Alaphilippe back in high life again on Velo.
author: ahood
